jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
What is the role about?

Leading the Marketplace team in Singapore has you leading the reins of the GOJEK rocketship. You’ll be responsible for leading a diverse and fast-paced org covering how we match supply & demand. This includes our operations and strategy around pricing, incentives, marketplace & city health, and much more.  As a leader within GOJEK, you’ll have a unique opportunity to shape GOJEK’s strategy and direction. 

Working with key leads within your team, you’ll be responsible for the cross-functional delivery of complex initiatives across our Singapore business. Strong communication skills, experience building and leading teams, and a love for tech & data is required succeed in this role. We’re looking for proven leaders to come and join our team!

This includes our operations and strategy around pricing, incentives, marketplace & city health, and much more.  As a leader within GOJEK, you’ll have a unique opportunity to shape GOJEK’s strategy and direction.

Working with key leads within your team, you’ll be responsible for the cross-functional delivery of complex initiatives across our Singapore business. Strong communication skills, experience building and leading teams, and a love for tech & data is required succeed in this role. We’re looking for proven leaders to come and join our team!
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Team Management - Lead a 5+ person team based in Singapore championing our strategy, management, and operations.
  • Cover several areas of how our business moves. 
  • Strategy Shaping - Build, maintain, and communicate a detailed strategy for our business. Write 3, 6, 12 month plans and help your team to do so. 
  • Champion of Structure & Operations - Refine our operations, improve our systems, and drive excellence in what we do at GOJEK. 
  • Build Strong Relationships -  Engage and collaborate with other Operation teams, Tech & Product groups, and our senior leadership at GOJEK.  
  • Team Development - Grow a team of smart & driven individuals. Shape their career paths, improve their skills, and help them manage the complexities of life at GOJEK.

• Experience Leading teams: Team management is an art and a science. You’ve refined your skills hiring, training, and building world-class organizations. You’ll continue that here. 
  • Fast & Agile: Ability to excel in a constantly changing and rapidly growing workplace. 
  • Communication: Strong communication skills. You know how to build trust, set goals, and get things done.
  • Outlook: When making decisions you leverage technical resources and data to support hypotheses. You can take the basics of data and draw insights from it. Life without Excel terrifies you. SQL, R, Python experience is a plus. 
  • Language:  Fluency in business-level English is a must. 
  • Required Experience: You’ve got prior learnings using data to make decisions, you have a proven track record of building systems and scaling them,  you have managed diverse stakeholders with ease. You have 5+ years of relevant experience, with at least 2 years leading teams. You understand how to leverage data to make decisions, drive outcomes, and build roadmaps.
